title: 7 local celebs who got married in 2019
text:
Love is in the air this year, and we love to see it!

2019 is quickly proving to be a year where many couples in celebville tie the knot, and they’re certainly doing it in style. From the glitz and glam we saw at Somizi and Mohale’s wedding to the tear-jerking vows at Dineo and Solo’s, these celebs have proven that love wins.

South Africa has come a long way and has developed into a country that celebrates love in all its forms. Same sex couples such as Nomsa and Zandile, Somizi and Mohale, as well as the soon-to-be married couple, Moshe and Phelo, constantly drive that point home. They inspire so many LGBTIQ+ couples that might’ve been too afraid to come out and celebrate their love.

From traditional wedding attires, the cutest baby bumps and the classic “white wedding”, it has all been so beautiful.

Even though most of these celebrities are very private when it comes to their private lives, they couldn’t help but share their beautiful moments with their supporters on social media.

Here’s a list of seven local celebs weddings we loved this year.

1. Somgaga and Mohale

2. Dineo and Solo

3. Nomsa and Zandile

4. Bontle and Priddy Ugly

5. Abdul and Baatile

6. Kwesta and Yolanda

7. Mmatema and Tshepo

So beautiful!
description: Love is in the air this year, and we love to see it!
